channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 17:30 ATTENTION !!!Threat of the use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).
item.description: 🟠 17:30 ATTENTION !!!Threat of the use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).#Polohiv_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 14:38 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now in Chervonogrigorivska territorial community. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 14:38 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now in Chervonogrigorivska territorial community. Take shelter! #Червоногригоривська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 14:11 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 14:11 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 14:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291

item.title: 🟡 12:24 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets and Marhanets territorial community- Myriv territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community- Pokrov territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community
